# Week 01 - Workshop

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Your first plot

```{r}
mpg
```


```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy))
```

```{r}
summary(mpg)
```

Color by `cty`

```{r}
ggplot(data = mpg) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy, color = cty))
```
